title: champion mastery bug/issue

replies.body: I know the feeling all to well, Im lvl 5 with Lux and Sona, and its like wh- wheres my hard work gone... {{champion:99}} {{champion:37}} {{item:3070}}
This is a bug that Riot is aware of, and they are currently working on it. Hold tight and it should be resolved soon.

I was level 4 Nautilus with Border, then it disappeared. I continued to play him until I reached Level 5 where I hoped that, upon reaching the next tier, the bug would correct itself. Suffice it to say that it didn't fix the problem and now I'm feeling pretty upset that I've done the grind and something on Riot's end, essentially, isn't rewarding me for my efforts.
